short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A plugin to annoy the grammar snob in all of us.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Plugin to annoy the inner grammar snob in all of us. This will replace all uses of the words There, Their, They're, Your and You're on every webpage you visit. Best used to annoy friends and confuse colleagues plain and simple.
